doc.field: Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Series XI: Broadcasts and Public Events
Series XI: Broadcasts and Public Events

This series contains audio and video recordings of Communist Party and Party affiliated meetings, lectures, public events, celebrations, broadcasts, and appearances of Party leaders in national media. Recordings in the first three subseries date from the 1950s to the 1990s and feature recordings of lectures, discussions, rallies, and public events. These recordings provide an extensive record of the public and political debates that the Party was engaged in during those years. Broadcast recordings feature tapes of radio and television programs produced by the Party, and feature recordings of three programs, Gus Hall's radio Update, and the television programs People Before Profits, and Changing America.
